channel.title: People who suck with computers
channel.description:
I love people who can't do well with computers, you can take advantage of them and make them get sooo scared and make them believe anything that isn't. Today at school this one girl ran a program for something and a CMD box came up and words were coming fast and shes like OMG WhAT HAPPENDD??? I said WTF THATS A VIRUS HOW DID YOU GET THAT!!!
Anyone ever take advantage over someone who aren't that good with computers.

item.title: People who suck with computers

Yeah brb gonna smash my friends keyboard hahaa pwnt <-- what teh fuck??

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:29, topic:411108”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=512378.msg3723142#msg3723142 date=1314076913]
Once in computers, i smashed this guys keyboard and half the keys didnt work, it was hilarious, and i deleted all the shortcuts to browsers he was all ragin
[/quote]
You smashed his keyboard? How is that… just never mind.[/quote]

Let him have his fun. It’s okay. We know.

item.title: People who suck with computers
item.dc:creator: @DannyC DannyC
item.description:
@DannyC wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:25, topic:411108”][quote author=DannyC link=topic=512378.msg3723096#msg3723096 date=1314073282]
Lol.

Me; “Dood! I just made da like proooest client eva!”

Harrison “zomgsend me it :D”

;;Harrison opens it;; 'client.bat

@echo off

start www.meatsp1n.com
start www.meatsp1n.com
start www.meatsp1n.com

It was 100k lines of that. I feel bad though, it crashed his pc ^>^, he was on skype when I did this. LOL!
[/quote]
Reminds me a tad bit of two nights ago, when I sent a shortcut that shutdown my friends laptop 3 seconds after opening with a message box saying “3…2…1…” and in the call you could hear, “what? … OH MY GOD CO-(generic skype disconnect sound)”[/quote]Lol’ed

Read full topic

item.title: People who suck with computers
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:9, topic:411108”]1: Right click desktop, click “create shortcut”.
2: For the shortcut path, enter Shutdown -s
3: Name the shortcut something like Minecraft, Mozilla Firefox, etc.
4: Right click real firefox (or whatever), click change icon, and copy the path.
5: Right click the shutdown shortcut, click change icon, paste icon path, and select the icon.
6: Anytime person tries to run browser, computer shuts down.
Done this so many times on other people’s computers.[/quote]
Lmao, I use to do that with remote desktop and upload it to media fire so if anyone ever lost their shortcut to remote desktop and they were searching for it my download was like the second link. Endless fun with the emails I got.

Read full topic

item.title: People who suck with computers
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:11, topic:411108”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=512378.msg3719145#msg3719145 date=1313822224]
1: Right click desktop, click “create shortcut”.
2: For the shortcut path, enter Shutdown -s
3: Name the shortcut something like Minecraft, Mozilla Firefox, etc.
4: Right click real firefox (or whatever), click change icon, and copy the path.
5: Right click the shutdown shortcut, click change icon, paste icon path, and select the icon.
6: Anytime person tries to run browser, computer shuts down.
Done this so many times on other people’s computers.
[/quote]

Did that to a girlfriend once, she was freaking out. Is that the same one where you can write a message in it?[/quote]
Yeah

Read full topic
